resources.string: This application generates fictional identities for testing purposes only. Any resemblance to real persons is purely coincidental. Use responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
No fingerprint registered on this device. Would you like to set up biometric authentication?
You can now use your fingerprint to unlock AnonForge.
You will need to use the PIN code to unlock the app. Are you sure you want to disable fingerprint unlock?
You entered the wrong PIN too many times. Please wait before trying again.
Generate your first identity to get started
Identity will be automatically deleted after expiration
Enter a custom name for this identity. 30 characters max.
Use fingerprint to unlock the app
Biometrics not available on this device
Use PIN to unlock the app
Enter a 6â€“8 digit PIN to protect your identities.
App will restart to apply change
Choose a preset range or random
Select preferred nationality for generated identities
All current data will be permanently lost.
Enter the password used when creating this backup to decrypt and import it.
Database imported successfully. The app will restart to apply changes.
Your backup will be encrypted with this password. You will need it to restore.
Your encrypted backup has been saved.
Password must be at least 8 characters
AnonForge generates realistic fictional identities for privacy testing. All data is stored locally and encrypted.
Permanently delete all identities and settings
This will permanently delete all your identities, settings, and security configuration. This action cannot be undone.
SimpleLogin creates email aliases that forward to your real inbox. When you need a disposable email, AnonForge will generate one via SimpleLogin.

To get your API key:
1. Log in to SimpleLogin
2. Go to Settings â†’ API Keys
3. Create a new key and paste it here
Connection failed. Check your API key.
Generated aliases will not be deleted from SimpleLogin, but you won\'t be able to create new ones without reconfiguring.
Automatically generate email aliases for new identities
Your API key is stored locally and encrypted. It is never shared.
Configure SimpleLogin to generate real email aliases
Tap to create or choose an alias
Create aliases on SimpleLogin then come back here
Configure SimpleLogin to import your aliases
A new alias will be generated via SimpleLogin
Select an alias or create a new one
Tap to choose from your imported aliases
This will delete all aliases from local history. Your SimpleLogin aliases will not be affected.
Create email aliases that forward to your real inbox. Protect your real email from spam and trackers.
Automatically generate aliases for new identities
Retrieve your existing aliases from SimpleLogin
Create a free SimpleLogin account to start protecting your email.
Your API key is encrypted and stored locally. It is never shared.
Your API key will be removed. You will need to reconfigure it to create new aliases.
Import new aliases from your account
Upgrade to premium for unlimited aliases
This will remove %1$d alias(es) from local storage. Your aliases on SimpleLogin will not be affected.
This will delete all locally stored aliases. Your SimpleLogin aliases will not be affected.
Alias limit reached. Delete old aliases or upgrade to premium.
Use temporary virtual numbers for signups. Get them from the services below, then add them here to reuse.
Include a virtual number in generated identities
These services offer temporary or virtual numbers:
Private numbers with calls and SMS
Add your virtual numbers to easily reuse them
This will delete all your saved numbers.
Your numbers are stored locally and encrypted. They are never shared.
Discover why privacy matters and how we protect you
Secure payment by Stripe. We never see your card.
Thank you for your support! â¤ï¸
Your support helps keep AnonForge free and privacy-focused.
Your donations help keep AnonForge free, ad-free, and privacy-focused. No data is collected.
Data breaches expose your email, phone, and identity daily. AnonForge helps you stay protected.
Check if your data was leaked
When a service gets hacked, your real data stays safe because you used a disposable identity.
Use a unique email per service. Disable the alias when it gets spam.
Sign up for services requiring phone verification without revealing your real number.
Get a temporary number from these services, then add it to AnonForge.
No data collection â€” Everything stays on your device
No cloud sync â€” Your identities never leave your phone
No analytics â€” We don\'t track your usage
No sharing â€” We don\'t sell or share anything
